~/welcome.txt.content:
Welcome to PenguWarp OS "Peach", chig!

Explore around, and do not forget to run 'pkgmgr search' daily to find new packages!.
Type 'help' to begin.

Built with Python & Tkinter.

~/test.pwe.content:
pkgmgr search
pkgmgr install snake
pkgmgr install todo
pkgmgr install dungeon
pkgmgr install cowsay
pkgmgr install matrix
echo [+] Installing Packages Succeeded! enjoy your pkgs :3

~/vim.txt.content: this is a text to test the vim-like environment of TUI PenguWarp eDITor
